name: Curupira
description:
"The curupira is a mythological character from brazilian folklore.
He is considered a guardian of the forest and his main features are his red hair and feet turned backwards.
In addition to its inverted footprints, his whistle and false signals allow him to fool hunters and travelers to drive them away from the forest."

-

This game was inspired on #PDJam (http://itch.io/jam/the-public-domain-jam). 

I couldn't participate, but I liked the idea ^_^

-

Made with:
Flash (AS3)
Photoshop
as3sfxr
Bosca Ceoil
